issue.title: [CF 1400] Destro Warlock Immolation Tracking with Bodyguard
issue.body:
When you use Ritssyn Flamescowl as your bodyguard in Broken Isles, TMW tracks both his and mine Immolate as same spell.

So I can't see if it's mine immolate that's up and needs to be refreshed, or if it's Ritssyn's.


> Posted by CurseForge user Shirah2003 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1400 | Raw

comments.body:
Track it by ID, or enable "Only cast by me" on the icon.

Edited Apr 30, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
